name: One Fine Evening
description:
This is a free fan game to celebrate the new ACNH release! Spending the evening with one of the twin doggos!

I really wanted to do something to celebrate the release of one of my favorite games but wound up pretty busy the past few weeks so I threw this together in the past couple days. I am planning to release the demo to one of my bigger original game projects soon if I don't wind up busy again! x3
